# [Interview #135: Dromen and Demonen Chat, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=135#21)

#### Medin-Sedai

Mister Jordan: stupid question maybe: but did you like our pipe?

#### Robert Jordan

Yes, I like the clay pipe. Thank you very much!
